entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 5:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling

Dewpoint: -5.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
